Package gameClient

Class KML_Logger

java.lang.Object
gameClient.KML_Logger
public class KML_Logger
extends java.lang.Object
This class is a static class whose purpose is to convert game to a KML file.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    KML_Logger()
    Instantiates a new KML_logger.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static void createKMLFile​(java.lang.String str, java.lang.String path)
    This method create KML file in the path inserted from the String str.
    static java.lang.String gameToKML​(Server.game_service game)
    Gets game info and return kml with timestamp of all the robots and fruits in the current game situation.
    static java.lang.String getCurrentTimestamp()
    Gets the current timestamp.
    static java.lang.String graphToKML​(java.lang.String graph_Json)
    Gets graph Json and return it as kml with no timestamp.
    static java.lang.String makeHead()
    Returns the opening of the KML file.
    static java.lang.String makeTail()
    return the ending of the KML file.
    static java.lang.String objectToKML​(double x, double y, java.lang.String icon)
    Gets object location and return it as kml with timestamp.

      public KML_Logger()

  • Method Details

    • makeHead

      public static java.lang.String makeHead()
      Returns the opening of the KML file. Additionaly declare the robots, fruits and nodes icon image.
      Returns:
      string contains the opening of the KML file.

    • gameToKML

      public static java.lang.String gameToKML​(Server.game_service game)
      Gets game info and return kml with timestamp of all the robots and fruits in the current game situation.
      Parameters:
      game - - the game.
      Returns:
      string kml of all the robots and fruits.

    • objectToKML

      public static java.lang.String objectToKML​(double x, double y, java.lang.String icon)
      Gets object location and return it as kml with timestamp.
      Parameters:
      x - - the x coordinate.
      y - - the y coordinate.
      icon - - the icon name of this object.
      Returns:
      string contains the object kml.

    • graphToKML

      public static java.lang.String graphToKML​(java.lang.String graph_Json)
      Gets graph Json and return it as kml with no timestamp.
      Parameters:
      graph_Json - - the graph json string.
      Returns:
      string contains the graph kml.

    • makeTail

      public static java.lang.String makeTail()
      return the ending of the KML file.
      Returns:
      string contains the ending of the KML file.

    • createKMLFile

      public static void createKMLFile​(java.lang.String str, java.lang.String path) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      This method create KML file in the path inserted from the String str.
      Parameters:
      str - - the str contains all kml information
      path - - where to save the file.
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - if file not found.

    • getCurrentTimestamp

      public static java.lang.String getCurrentTimestamp()
      Gets the current timestamp.
      Returns:
      the current timestamp
